description:
I'm afraid that I have some sad news.
Patrick has become very serious with his girlfriend and they've decided to get married. Patrick felt it was time to retire from porn and focus more on having a family.
I've known Patrick for almost two years now and I've enjoyed watching him progress from catalog model to the versatile sex machine he's become. I wish him all the best but I'm definitely going to miss that big ole dick of his!
On the plus side, I was able to get him to do one last film with Samuel, a really fun guy who's flexible and loves to get fucked. As usual, Patrick didn't disappoint, eating Samuel's ass out and fingering his hole in preparation for the real thing...
title: Patrick & Samuel
